title: The Registered Developer with acquired rights from the owner/s of the slum land and who hold consent of 51% slum dwellers shall be allowed to submit the scheme as prescribed in preceding regulation
clause_text: The Registered Developer with acquired rights from the owner/s of the slum land and who hold consent of 51% slum dwellers shall be allowed to submit the scheme as prescribed in preceding regulation. Such a scheme shall be accepted by C.E.O. and the C.E.O. will order Competent Authority to prepare eligibility list of slum dwellers in Annexure II.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
